Job Posting:170120 - Position: F25 Intern - ServiceNow Developer 170120 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/03/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/27/2025 12:31 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country iA Financial Group (Industrial Alliance) 988 West Broadway Vancouver V5Z 1K7 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Intern - ServiceNow Developer 170120 Co-op Position Various. QC Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Sector: IT / Team: Digital Service and Enterprise Service Management / Locations: QC-MTL / Fall 2025 Internship Are you currently studying computer science and eager to expand your knowledge on a widely-used industry platform through a university-accredited internship? Interested in discovering the ITIL v4 methodology? Want to contribute to a DEVOPS-mode team? This internship is for you! If you still have doubts, read on! We are currently looking for a ServiceNow Developer Intern to join the IT Service Operations and Delivery team. Wondering what ServiceNow is? It's a widely-used platform that helps manage various IT practices, such as incident, request, and problem management. Keep in mind that the knowledge you gain on this platform will benefit you throughout your career! What does a ServiceNow Developer Intern do? Here's a summary: • We will need your problem-solving skills to execute necessary corrective actions to restore service in case of incidents, handle service requests, and help establish root causes of problems; • We will need your technical skills to perform various tasks required in a maintenance framework (monitoring, production surveillance), as well as in the evolution or delivery of IT systems under the team's responsibility; • We will need your writing skills to produce and maintain technical documentation such as procedures, operation guides, intervention plans, scripts and modules, test plans, etc.; • We will need your communication skills to participate in daily stand-ups with the entire team to review activity progress and validate support needs. A few key points about the ServiceNow platform (back end): • Development is done in JavaScript and allows for complementing the platform's various "no-code" applications; The team also supports other applications developed in C# that interface with ServiceNow APIs; • Job Requirements You must be proficient in JavaScript and C# (.Net). Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Intern - ServiceNow Developer | iA Financial Group Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
